description: This file contains functions for managing workspaces and user teams via API calls, including creating, updating, and logging workspace events.

methods.name: get_teams_for_user
methods.description: Fetches all teams associated with a user via API.

methods.name: create_workspace_for_user
methods.description: Creates a new workspace for a user, optionally associating it with a team.

methods.name: update_workspace_for_user
methods.description: Updates an existing workspace for a user.

methods.name: update_workspace_for_team
methods.description: Updates a workspace for a specific team.

methods.name: log_workspace_event
methods.description: Logs an event related to a workspace for a user.
